## SentryAlertLinkObject type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type SentryAlertLinkObject = {
    metadata: {
        type: 'sentryAlert';
        organizationId: string;
        lastAlertEvent: string;
        alertRuleId: string;
        lastAlertStatus: 'critical' | 'warning' | 'resolved';
    };
};
```
